Description: Fragment of oval, tapering handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-brown. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Timotheos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0224.15 and Gezer, no. 447.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (267)
